prompts.prompt:
Develop a tic-tac-toe web application that is both simple and engaging, with a responsive design using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

Key Features:
3x3 Game Grid: Display the tic-tac-toe board as a 3x3 grid.
Two Players: Allow two players to take turns, playing as X and O.
Win Detection: Automatically detect and highlight the winning combination or declare a tie if no moves are left.
Reset Button: Include a button to start a new game after a game concludes or at any time during gameplay.
Scorecard: Maintain and display a scorecard that tracks the number of wins for each player.
Design:
Apply Tailwind CSS to style the game board, buttons, and scorecard with a modern and clean aesthetic.
Incorporate smooth animations for player moves and winning combinations.
Page Routing:
The main page (index route) should host the game board and scorecard.
Implementation Details:
Create components for the game grid, individual cells, scoreboard, and reset button.
Use React state to keep track of the game's progress, including the current player, board status, and player scores.
Implement game logic to handle turns, check for winners, and update the scorecard after each game.
